name: Kiwi's Project - Platformer Prototype
description:
Play as Kiwi, a character that can jump, roll and use a prostetic arm to reach far places.
This is an early Platformer Prototype. The game may contain bugs and errors.
The goal of this demo is to show the potential of the game.

Everything made in this game (sprites, assets, level design) is developed by DreamNauts Games.
